incidents.name: Twilio Flex / TaskRouter Voice Orchestrator Affected

incident_updates.body:
Twilio Flex / TaskRouter Voice Orchestrator was degraded for 2 minutes between 14:01 and 14:03 Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time High latency in Voice Orchestrator caused 5xxs in downstreams resulting in some impact to inbound and outbound meetings
Customer Impact:  Some inbound and outbound meetings would have failed, more impact to be provided after assessment. Likely 35 meetings impacted. The issue has now been resolved.Twilio Flex / Task Router Voice Orchestrator was degraded for 2 minutes between 14:01 and 14:03 Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time High latency in Voice Orchestrator caused 5xxs in downstreams resulting in some impact to inbound and outbound meetings
Customer Impact:  Some inbound and outbound meetings would have failed, more impact to be provided after assessment. Likely less than 100 meetings impacted. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in India for a Subset of Preregistered Sender IDs

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS towards multiple networks in India was degraded for 332 minutes between 3:10 a.m. and 8:42 a.m. Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS delivery failures towards multiple networks in India, when sending from preregistered alphanumeric sender IDs. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays and/or failures when sending messages to Moov in Ivory Coast. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa.

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Cameroon:  Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ghana: Vodafone
- Ivory Coast: Orange, MTN, Moov
- Sierra Leone: Africel

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Failure to Retrieve Trial Phone Numbers during New Account Onboarding

incident_updates.body: The issue with provisioning trial phone numbers has been resolved and phone number provisioning is operating normally at this time.

Our engineers have identified that there were some numbers in bad state which were causing this issue for a select few instances during number instances. This is not something that is impacting our all customers. 

Phone Number Provisioning is operating normally. And we continue to monitor for system stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue unable to get trial phone numbers provisioned and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures from a Subset Of Twilio Denmark Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound calls to a subset of Twilio Denmark phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for inbound calls to Twilio Denmark phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing call failures from a subset of Twilio Denmark phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing inbound call failures to Twilio Denmark phone numbers has been identified. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Outgoing Traffic Impacted

incident_updates.body: The effects of this incident have completely passed through the system and all traffic is operating normally. This incident has been resolved. In addition to the previously described expected error codes of Validity Period Expired (30036) and Twilio Internal Error (30500), a large portion of affected messages were finalized to a Failed status (note Failed not Undelivered) with error code 30008 (Unknown Error).

We continue monitoring remaining queued messages. Overall, the system has reached a normal steady state; Now, most messages are sending without any additional queueing delay. However, individual customers may see messages remaining in queues due to large numbers of messages enqueued during this incident. We expect any messages delayed during this incident to have fully propagated through to a final status over the course of the next several hours. Note that we expect that some messages will eventually timeout and fail due to Validity Period Expired (error code 30036), others may eventually fail due to a Twilio Internal Error (error code 30500).
We will provide an update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue monitoring remaining queued messages. Overall, the system has reached a normal steady state; Now, most messages are sending without any additional queueing delay. However, individual customers may see messages remaining in queues due to large numbers of messages enqueued during this incident. We expect any messages delayed during this incident to have fully propagated through to a final status over the course of the next several hours. Note that we expect that some messages will eventually timeout and fail due to Validity Period Expired (error code 30036), others may eventually fail due to a Twilio Internal Error (error code 30500).
We will provide an update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

However, individual customers may see messages remaining in queues due to large numbers of messages enqueued during this incident. Note that we expect that some messages will eventually timeout and fail due to Validity Period Expired (error code 30036), others may eventually fail due to a Twilio Internal Error (error code 30500).
We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to monitor remaining queued messages. Overall, the system has reached a normal steady state; Now, most messages are sending without any additional queueing delay. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing our investigation and have discovered Conversations is affected by this issue.

incidents.name: 500 Errors for Messaging Channels Message Send Requests (including WhatsApp)

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Channels were degraded for 32 seconds between 11:11-11:12 AM Pacific Time on 03/26/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced 500 errors from the Twilio API. The issue has now been resolved.
We are experiencing an internal issue that may result in SMS errors. We will provide an update in 1 hour, or as soon as more information is available.

incidents.name: Delay in Delivery Receipt Processing in Conversations

incident_updates.body: Customers may have experienced Delays in Delivery Receipt Processing in Conversations. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to Bell and Bell Aliant Network in Canada

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing delivery report delays via a subset of long codes to Bell and Bell Aliant Network in Canada. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in message delivery reports via a subset of long codes to Bell and Bell Aliant Network. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports via a subset of long codes to Bell and Bell Aliant Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incidents.name: Dashboards (Messaging Services) and Messaging Insights Page via Console May Include Stale Data

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issues causing stale data on some of the dashboards (Messaging Services) in the Twilio Console Messaging Insights page. This incident is now resolved.

Our Engineering Team has identified the issue causing stale data on some of the dashboards (Messaging Services) in the Twilio Console Messaging Insights page. The team is currently monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Conversations Roles caching rollout caused forbidden errors.

incident_updates.body: Customers who updated the roles and tried to use the updated ones couldn't get the updated values and ended up using the outdated versions of roles. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to O2 Network in Slovakia

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Slovakia. This incident has been resolved.

We are still observing an improvement when sending messages to the O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers will monitor the issue for 2 more hours. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We are observing an improvement on when sending messages to the O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers are monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available

During our investigation, we confirmed that only SMS delivery report delays are occuring when sending messages to the O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers continue to actively work with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We keep experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Slovakia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: High rate of 5xx due to Autoscaling Failure

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing Autoscaling Failure. This incident has been resolved.
We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
The issue has been fixed now. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Autoscaling Failure. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Flex insights dashboards is not accessible

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issues with Flex Insights Dashboards not being accesible. This incident has been resolved.

We are able to access the Flex insights dashboard now. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex insights boards which currently not accessible. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
